Package com.example.usersapi.exception

Class ApiExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.usersapi.exception.ApiExceptionHandler
  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ApiExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The ApiExceptionHandler class is a global exception handler for handling different types of exceptions that may occur in the API. It uses the @ControllerAdvice annotation to handle exceptions globally across all controllers in the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ApiExceptionHandler()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> dateTimeParseException​(java.time.format.DateTimeParseException ex)
      Handles DateTimeParseException and returns a ResponseEntity with a BAD_REQUEST status and a generic error message.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> duplicateUsernameException​(DuplicateUsernameException ex)
      Handles DuplicateUsernameException and returns a ResponseEntity with a CONFLICT status and the exception message.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> handleConstraintViolationException​(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException ex)
      Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException and returns a ResponseEntity with a BAD_REQUEST status and the validation error messages concatenated into a single string.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> invalidUserException​(InvalidUserException ex)
      Handles InvalidUserException and returns a ResponseEntity with a BAD_REQUEST status and the exception message.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> resourceNotFoundException​(ResourceNotFoundException ex)
      Handles ResourceNotFoundException and returns a ResponseEntity with a NOT_FOUND status and the exception message.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        @ExceptionHandler(InvalidUserException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> invalidUserException​(InvalidUserException ex)
        Handles InvalidUserException and returns a ResponseEntity with a BAD_REQUEST status and the exception message.

        ex - The InvalidUserException that occurred.
        Returns:
